Detailed Description

HTML class.

This class is used to generate HTML elements.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework

2008 David Singer
Author:
David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
Version:
1.8.1

$  force = false 
)

Sets the tag name.

string $element The tag name. Set to FALSE for tagless.

Boo_Html::$standardElements [static, protected]
Initial value:
 array(
        'a', 'abbr', 'acronym', 'address', 'area', 'b', 'big', 'blockquote',
        'body', 'button', 'caption', 'cite', 'code', 'col', 'colgroup', 'dd', 'del',
        'dfn', 'div', 'dl', 'dt', 'em', 'fieldset', 'form', 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6',
        'hr', 'i', 'img', 'input', 'ins', 'kbd', 'label', 'legend', 'li',
        'link', 'noscript', 'object', 'ol', 'optgroup', 'option', 'p',
        'pre', 'q', 'samp', 'select', 'small', 'span', 'strong', 'sub', 'sup',
        'table', 'tbody', 'td', 'textarea', 'tfoot', 'th', 'thead', 'tr', 'tt', 'ul', 'var')

List of HTML elements that support the common attributes.

Common attributes are:

  • class
  • id
  • style
  • title
  • dir
  • xml:lang
  • xml:space
See also:
http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml-modularization/abstract_modules.html#s_common_collection
Since:
2.0.0

Definition at line 149 of file Html.php.
